name: ext-archive-c
description: Archive parsing/extraction helpers + pinned archive policies (tar/tgz v1).
docs:
Archive parsing/extraction helpers + pinned archive policies (tar/tgz v1).

Modules:
- std.archive
- std.archive.tar
- std.archive.tgz
- std.archive.tests

Usage:
- Add dependency: x07 pkg add ext-archive-c@0.1.1
- Use std.archive.*_from_arch_v1 helpers with repo-pinned profiles under arch/archive.
